name: One Stop Code Shop
description: This is the Full Stack Mern App containing the combined version of One Stop Code Shop and it's associated forum. Users will be able to complete a consolidated coding search and use our forum to get help from the community. Please use demo for both the username and password to test the site.
techUsed: React JS, CSS, Node JS, Express

name: NYT React
description: An application that utilizes the New York Times API to pull articles from the users choice of topic and date range. The user can then save an article to a mongo database, or delete the article.

name: Eat-Dat-Burger
description: An application the allows the user to input different hamburgers they would like to try. All burgers are stored on a mySQL database. The user can save the burger they ate to their burger hall of fame, or choose to delete it right away and hopefully forget they ever ate it. After storing it in the hall of fame, a user can change their mind or make sure to only keep their new top burgers stored.
techUsed: Handlebars, CSS, mySQL, Node JS, Express

name: One Stop Code Shop - Forum
description: A site that allows users to communicate with each other through forum posts and a chat. Please use demo and demo as login info to view the site. I worked on the overall handlebars set up for each page and the routing to connect mySQL to the site.

name: Friend Finder
description: An application where a user can answer questions to connect with another user with similar interests. Information is stored in a json file which is then compared to the users form inputs.
